statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50
SELECT location FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume < 1000
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM TrafficData ORDER BY speed ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'Highway A'
SELECT vehicle_id, location, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY speed DESC, location ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume > 200
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, location FROM traffic_data WHERE location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060);
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT camera_id, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed, location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = true ORDER BY latitude, longitude ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE location = POINT(37.7749, -122.4194);
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed, location FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data td JOIN traffic_cameras tc ON td.location = POINT(tc.latitude, tc.longitude);
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(sensor_type) FROM DeviceData GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE vehicle_count > 100 AND flow_direction = 'North' LIMIT 10;
SELECT area_name, AVG(population) FROM UrbanPlanningData GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY AVG(population) DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC, sensor_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, location FROM DeviceData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT flow_id, road_name, flow_direction FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT plan_id, area_name, population FROM UrbanPlanningData WHERE development_status = 'pending' ORDER BY population DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceData WHERE location = 'New York' AND sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Humidity') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrafficSensors;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM TrafficSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Speed';
SELECT sensor_id, location, installation_date FROM TrafficSensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_flow > 100;
SELECT area_name, population FROM UrbanPlanning WHERE avg_income > 50000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT data_id, traffic_flow, traffic_speed FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_flow > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM TrafficSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Speed' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM TrafficEvents JOIN TrafficSensors ON TrafficEvents.sensor_id = TrafficSensors.sensor_id WHERE event_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name, population FROM UrbanPlanning WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM TrafficEvents WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_type, last_communication FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT camera_id, camera_location FROM Traffic_cameras WHERE camera_status = TRUE;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_location, event_timestamp FROM Traffic_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_description FROM Urban_planning WHERE plan_name LIKE '%smart%' ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM IoT_devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, camera_location FROM Traffic_cameras WHERE camera_status = true;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_description FROM Urban_planning ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_length FROM Road_segments WHERE segment_length > 100 ORDER BY segment_length ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_location, event_timestamp FROM Traffic_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
